name: Dairy Dave
summary: You take control of Dave, the involuntary star of a commercial for a big milk corporation. While avoiding obstacles, your main goal in this beautiful mountain panorama is – you have probably guessed it – to collect as much milk as possible. Dave can move around freely on the screen with controls inspired by famous classic Jump and Runs. But beware: You are running against the clock! So make sure to keep milking to refill the timer. While you progress through the game, the obstacles become tougher to avoid, too. The graphics, music, and sound effects are straight-up inspired by the good old days of video game history.
